properties.areaDesc: Breton Sound; Chandeleur Sound; Coastal Waters from Boothville LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River out 20 nm; Lake Pontchartrain and Lake Maurepas; Coastal waters from the Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island out 20 NM; Mississippi Sound; Lake Borgne
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 12 at 3:11PM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to 1/2 NM or less.

* WHERE...Sounds, bays, tidal lakes, and marine around Mississippi
Delta.

* WHEN...Until noon CST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Low
visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY
